customers.description: Customer information including contact details and registration date
customers.business_context: Stores all registered customers who can place orders

email.description: Customer's email address, used for login and communication

created_at.description: When the customer account was created

products.description: Product catalog with pricing and inventory status
products.business_context: All items available for sale in the e-commerce store

category.description: Product category (Electronics, Sports, Home, Clothing, Books)

in_stock.description: Whether the product is currently available for purchase

created_at.description: When the product was added to catalog

orders.business_context: Tracks all purchase transactions from cart to delivery

customer_id.description: Reference to the customer who placed the order

status.description: Order status: pending, processing, shipped, delivered, or cancelled

order_items.description: Individual line items within each order
order_items.business_context: Links products to orders with quantity and price at time of purchase

unit_price.description: Price per unit at time of purchase (may differ from current product price)
